```{r}
#| label: fetch-talks
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| warning: false
tmp <- tempfile(fileext = ".md")
ans <- download.file(
  url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gvegayon/talks/refs/heads/master/README.md",
  destfile = tmp
)

# We should have no error
stopifnot(ans == 0)

readLines(tmp) |>
  cat(sep = "\n")
```
